desc: Changing the world one lipstick tube at a time. New Zealand's first zero waste lipstick. Looking good is one thing, but knowing that what you are using is kind to you, animals, earth and others feels even better. Now you can look and feel unstoppable, guilt free. Free shipping on all NZ orders over $70.

layout.text: Changing the world one plastic free tube at a time
Zero waste makeup for those who care
